name: Outlast

files.file1: N/A:Please select the Humble install file

execute.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
exe: game/Binaries/Linux/OLGame.i686
exe64: game/Binaries/Linux/OLGame.x86_64
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble install file
- unzip: http://lutris.net/files/tools/unzip.tar.gz
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $unzip
- execute:
    args: $file1 -d "$CACHE" "data/*"
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    file: $CACHE/unzip
- merge:
    dst: $CACHE/data/noarch
    src: $CACHE/data/i686
- merge:
    dst: $CACHE/data/noarch
    src: $CACHE/data/x86_64
- rename:
    dst: $CACHE/data/game
    src: $CACHE/data/noarch
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/data/game
